config.solutionText: We are working towards a solution
config.testingInstructions: The rest of your household do not need to self-isolate, unless you begin to experience symptoms or receive a positive test result.
config.closeContactAssistance: They can help you understand this message and its implications. If you think this message is incorrect you have the right to challenge it by calling the above number. For further information please see our [privacy notice]({{ link }}).

common.name: Protect Scotland
common.networkError: Connection issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.

tryAgain.title: Please try again
tryAgain.description:
Sorry, that didn’t work properly.
Please check that you have a network connection and try again.

exposureNotifications.title: ‘Exposure Notifications’ are required
exposureNotifications.instructionsios:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Switch on ‘COVID-19 Exposure Notifications’
2. Re-open this app
exposureNotifications.instructionsandroid:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Select ‘Google > COVID-19 Exposure Notifications’
3. Switch on ‘Exposure Notifications’
4. Re-open this app
exposureNotifications.turnOn: Please ensure ‘COVID-19 Exposure Notifications’ are switched on for this device

bluetoothNotifications.title: Bluetooth is required
bluetoothNotifications.instructions:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Select ‘Bluetooth’
3. Switch on ‘Bluetooth’
4. Re-open this app

sendNotifications.title: ‘App Notifications’ are required
sendNotifications.instructions:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Select ‘{{name}}’
3. Switch on ‘Notifications’
4. Re-open this app

resultCodeMoreInfo.instructions: App users you have been in close contact with will be told that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 but won’t know who it was.

clearContacts.instructions: Are you sure you want to clear your close contact alerts?

ageRequirement.notice: You must be {{ ageLimit }} or older to use this app

underAlert.title: You must be {{ ageLimit }} or older to use this app
underAlert.body: If you are under {{ ageLimit }}, please remove this app from your device

locationConfirmation.notice: People living in or visiting Scotland can use this app.
locationConfirmation.description: To be able to put a COVID-19 test result code into this app, you must have applied for your test under a Scottish address.
locationConfirmation.question: Are you living in or visiting Scotland?

noAlert.title: Only people living in or visiting Scotland can use this app.
noAlert.body: You are advised not to try to use this app, and are encouraged to use an app that will work for you, in your area.

locationConfirmation.noBtn: I do not reside in Scotland

view.title: Why use this contact tracing app?
view.main: Using it will help all of us in Scotland by stopping or slowing the spread of COVID-19. This supports NHS Scotland and helps us avoid lockdowns.
view.text: By using this app you are really helping us stay safe, protect Scotland and save lives. **Thank you.**

view.title: How does this app work?
view.textBell: **If you are in close contact** with an app user who has added a positive COVID-19 test code to their app, this app will notify you. **You won’t know who or where.**
view.textUnion: **If you test positive for COVID-19** you will be contacted by the contact tracing team, who will provide you with a test result code to add to this app. This will trigger notifications to other app users that you have been in close contact with. **This app will never reveal your identity or location.**

view.title: How is my privacy protected?
view.textKey:
If you test positive for COVID-19 a contact tracer will call you. As part of the call they will send you a **Test Result Code** by SMS text message from **'TestProtect'**. When you put that code into this app you will be asked if you want to share the **Random IDs** (encrypted, anonymised random keys) that your mobile phone has been exchanging with other app users’ mobile phones over the last {{ tracePeriod }} days. If you agree, these **'diagnosis keys'** will allow us to notify those app users that they have been exposed to COVID-19.

 # 

**We will never ask you to reply to the SMS text message.** Please ignore any message asking you to reply or send information.
view.textKey1: {{ solutionText }} to securely share 'diagnosis keys' with other countries - so that you will soon be able to use this app when visiting other countries. This will also allow apps used by visitors from those countries to work here.
view.textEye:
**This app will never track your identity or location**, but it does collect some statistics. NHS Scotland will know the total number of app users, the number of people in Scotland who enter a Test Result Code, and the number of app users who are notified that they have been exposed to COVID-19.

 # 

**We need this data to prove that the app works,** and comply with regulators.

view.title: Are you happy to continue?
view.textBell:
To tell you as soon as possible if you’ve been exposed to COVID-19, we use a manual process followed by **automated processing**.  This means there is a minimum of human involvement, only when the contact tracing team sends you a test result code.

 # 

To be able to use this app, you will be asked to turn on ‘exposure notifications’. By doing this, you agree to the automated processing.

 # 

If you test positive, you will be contacted by a member of the contact tracing team, who will advise you to self-isolate.
view.confirmation: Do you agree to continue and start using this app?
view.tc: If you tap ‘Yes’ you are accepting the Terms and Conditions.
view.optOut:
## You can choose to opt out at any time.

To do this select **‘Leave’** in **‘Settings’** in this app.

accessibility.yesHint: Agree to continue and start using this app

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: If you don’t consent you won’t get the full functionality, i.e. exposure notifications

ios.title: Please update Apple iOS to use this app
ios.text1: You need to do this to use the ‘Exposure Notification Service’ created by Apple to help make apps like this work and stop COVID-19.

android.title: Please update Google Play Services to use this app
android.text1: You need to do this to use the ‘Exposure Notification Service’ created by Google to help make apps like this work and stop COVID-19.

view.title: Last few steps...
view.item1:
Next, you will be asked for your permission to enable contact tracing technologies and notifications for this app.

 # 

This technology will not collect or share any information about you or your location.
view.item2: Please give your permission so that the app can work properly.

timestampError.title: Check Date & Time
timestampError.description: We couldn’t verify your device. Please check it’s set to the correct date and time, and try again.

message.standard: You can close this app and it will keep working
message.inactive: Tracing is not active, so this app won’t work
message.paused: Tracing is not active, so this app won’t work

dashboard.isolationCompleteSupplemental: The app has returned to normal usage
dashboard.thanks: Thank you for helping save lives
tour:
Thank you.

The app is all set up and tracing is on
Help your community by inviting others to join and take part
Go here to find out more about how the app works
Tested positive? Add your test code and help protect others
dashboard.alternateTourStart: Tracing is not active at the moment but you can fix this later

symptomChecker.message:
**Not feeling well?**
Check if you have COVID-19 symptoms and book a test
symptomChecker.hint: Illustration of a woman holding her forehead while taking her own temperature.

tracing.heading: Tracing
tracing.body: If you are in close contact with an app user who has tested positive for COVID-19 and added that result to their app, this app will notify you.
tracing.additional: For additional guidance about using this app in different environments, please see [FAQs]({{ link }})
tracing.illustrationLabel: Man on phone sitting on couch
tracing.message: You can close this app and tracing will keep working. If you want to stop tracing and opt out select ‘Leave’ from the ‘Settings’ menu in this app.
tracing.inactiveMessage: Tracing is not active, so this app won’t work. To fix this go to your device ‘Settings’ and turn on:
tracing.inactiveMessage1: If you want to stop tracing and opt out select **‘Leave’** from the **‘Settings’** menu in this app.
tracing.notificationBody: You have been in **close contact with someone who has COVID-19**

paused.title: Paused
paused.text: Tracing is not active, so this app is not exchanging any data with other users’ apps.
paused.buttonHint: Restarts contact tracing after being paused

community.heading: Share and Protect
community.body: Contact tracing is more effective when more people use this app. Invite others to download the app and help protect our community.
community.illustrationLabel: Woman and two children holding hands
community.downloadsLabel: Hand holding an app with bluetooth icon

about.heading: About this App
about.link: Read more about this app and the technology used

closeContactNotification.title: IMPORTANT: Close Contact Alert
closeContactNotification.description: You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. Tap here to open the app and find out what to do.

enableExposure.title: Enable COVID-19 Exposure Notifications from "{{name}}"
enableExposure.description: This is needed so that this app can understand when your phone is near another phone with this app.

sendNotifications.title: "{{name}}" would like to Send You Notifications
sendNotifications.description: Notifications may include alerts, sounds and icon badges.These can be configured in Settings.

closeContact.title: Action Required
closeContact.body1: You must self-isolate for {{ isolationDuration }} days after a close contact with a positive case. The last known exposure date is {{exposureDate}}. This exposure date counts as day 1 of the {{ isolationDuration }} day isolation period. The isolation period ends on day {{ isolationEnd }}.
closeContact.link1Hint: Opens a link with close contact information
closeContact.link2Hint: Opens a link with self-isolation information
closeContact.link3: What support is available for me to self-isolate?
closeContact.link3Hint: Opens a link with self-isolation support
closeContact.assistanceMessage: If you require further guidance, please contact the {{ helpline }} [{{ helplineNumber }}](tel:{{ helplineNumberTrimmed }})
closeContact.notWell:
**Not feeling well?**

# NHSInform.scot

Read the latest advice about getting tested and the stay at home guidance for households self-isolating.
closeContact.notWell1:
# Symptoms getting worse?

You should [phone 111](tel:111) if your symptoms worsen or if you notice new symptoms.

tests.heading: Add Test Code
tests.content: If you test positive for COVID-19 you can add that result to this app and alert others. This will never reveal your identity or location.
tests.illustrationLabel: Woman using app to add test result
tests.modalContent: App users you have been in close contact with will be told that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 but won’t know who it was
tests.permissionError: We have not uploaded your keys as you did not grant permission.
tests.uploadError: An error occurred trying to upload

add.heading: Add Test Code
add.description: You should only enter a Test Code if you have tested positive for COVID-19
add.uploadOnlyDescription:
Test Code was already added.
You just need to submit it.

result.heading: Thank you.
result.advice: You should follow the advice given to you by the Contact Tracer.
result.label1: You must self-isolate for {{duration}} days following your positive test result.
result.label2: Your identity will NOT be shared. Your personal data or any identifiable information will NOT be shared.
result.label2dontShare: Your random IDs have NOT been shared. App users you have been in close contact with will NOT be notified that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19.

result.resubmitHint: I've changed my mind and wish to warn / protect others

view.heading: Add Test Result
view.description: You have verified that you have tested positive for COVID-19. You should self-isolate for 7 days from the start of your symptoms.
view.tellMore: I’ve tested positive. Tell me more about self-isolation.

clearData.message: Want to get rid of your close contact alert?

action.label: Clear Close Contact Alert
action.hint: Buttons clears your Clear Close Contact Alert and all exposure service data on your device

clearData.confirmText: Are you sure you want to clear all your Close Contacts?
clearData.error: There was an error clearing your Close Contacts. Please try again.

leave.title: Leave
leave.body:
Thank you for helping to fight COVID-19. We’re sorry to see you go. When you tap ‘I want to leave’ we will remove all data stored by the app from your device.

Random IDs created or collected by Exposure Notification Services cannot be removed by this app. If you want to remove these, do this through your device ‘Settings’.

control.label: I want to leave
control.hint: Exits the app and deletes all data

confirm.title: Leave
confirm.text: Are you sure you want to leave?

leave.error: There was an error clearing your data. Please try again or contact us.

terms.body: The full details of the Terms & Conditions can be read at [{{ link }}]({{ link }})

dataPolicy.body: The full details of the privacy notice can be read at [{{ link }}]({{ link }})

pause.title: Pause Tracing
pause.body: There are some situations where you may wish to temporarily suspend proximity tracing, e.g. if you work in a clinical setting, wearing medical grade PPE.
pause.label: For more information see [FAQs]({{ link }})

reminder.title: REMINDER: Restart Tracing
reminder.message: Tap here to open the app. Then tap `Restart Tracing` to activate contact tracing
